mapper.select: SELECT RV.reservation_no, RV.reservation_datetime, RV.route_id, RV.user_id, R.bus_id, R.departure_bus_stop_id, BD.bus_stop_name AS departure_bus_stop_name, R.departure_time, R.arrival_bus_stop_id, BA.bus_stop_name AS arrival_bus_stop_name, R.arrival_time, R.price * (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_DETAIL WHERE reservation_no = RV.reservation_no) AS total_price FROM RESERVATION RV INNER JOIN ROUTE R ON RV.route_id = R.route_id INNER JOIN BUS_STOP BD ON R.departure_bus_stop_id = BD.bus_stop_id INNER JOIN BUS_STOP BA ON R.arrival_bus_stop_id = BA.bus_stop_id INNER JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL RD ON RV.reservation_no = RD.reservation_no WHERE RV.USER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY RV.RESERVATION_NO, R.BUS_ID, r.departure_bus_stop_id, bd.bus_stop_name, r.departure_time, r.arrival_bus_stop_id, ba.bus_stop_name, r.arrival_time, total_price

SELECT DISTINCT RV.USER_ID, M.LAST_NAME||M.FIRST_NAME AS FULL_NAME, M.tel FROM RESERVATION AS RV INNER JOIN MEMBER AS M ON RV.USER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE RV.ROUTE_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND RESERVATION_DATETIME= #{reservationDate} ORDER BY RV.USER_ID

SELECT RV.reservation_datetime, RV.route_id, R.bus_id, R.departure_bus_stop_id, BD.bus_stop_name AS departure_bus_stop_name, R.departure_time, R.arrival_bus_stop_id, BA.bus_stop_name AS arrival_bus_stop_name, R.arrival_time, B.COLUMN_NUM * B.ROW_NUM AS TOTAL_SEATS, (B.NUMBER_PLACE || B.NUMBER_DIVISION ||' '|| B.NUMBER_KANA ||' '|| B.NUMBER_FIRST_HALF || '‚Äê' || B.NUMBER_LATTER_HALF) AS BUS_FULL_NAME, COUNT(RD.SEAT_NAME)AS RESERVED_SEATS FROM RESERVATION_DETAIL AS RD INNER JOIN RESERVATION AS RV ON RD.RESERVATION_NO = RV.RESERVATION_NO INNER JOIN ROUTE R ON RV.route_id = R.route_id INNER JOIN BUS_STOP BD ON R.departure_bus_stop_id = BD.bus_stop_id INNER JOIN BUS_STOP BA ON R.arrival_bus_stop_id = BA.bus_stop_id INNER JOIN BUS AS B ON B.BUS_ID = R.BUS_ID WHERE R.ROUTE_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND RESERVATION_DATETIME= #{reservationDate} GROUP BY RV.reservation_datetime, RV.route_id, R.BUS_ID, r.departure_bus_stop_id, bd.bus_stop_name, r.departure_time, r.arrival_bus_stop_id, ba.bus_stop_name, r.arrival_time, TOTAL_SEATS, BUS_FULL_NAME
